title: security_incident
label: Security Incident
description: Records unauthorized access, data breaches, or other malicious activities compromising system integrity.

incidentName.example: Unauthorized SSH Login Attempt Detected on Server-192

closeReason.example: False positive, alert resolved after investigation.

participants.example: John Doe, Jane Smith, Michael Johnson, Sarah Williams

incidentDataSource.example: EDR Platform - CrowdStrike Falcon Detection Engine
